ruling: - [[A Wingbeat of Giant Dragon]] targets 1 Level 5 or higher Dragon-Type monster.
- If you select a Level 5 or higher Dragon-Type Fusion Monster, it is returned to your Fusion Deck.
- If the selected Dragon-Type monster is flipped face-down, removed from the field, or has its Monster Type changed, [[A Wingbeat of Giant Dragon]]'s effect disappears.
